overview: From 2025-07-08 to 2025-07-09, elizaos/eliza had 43 new PRs (36 merged), 3 new issues, and 14 active contributors.

topIssues.title: Fails to load @elizaos/plugin-openai and @elizaos/plugin-bootstrap on Windows
topIssues.author: gcbsumid
topIssues.body: **Describe the bug** On 1.0.17, when I run `elizaos dev` on windows (powershell 7), it tries to load openai plugin (1.0.6) and bootstrap (1.0.15) but it fails to do so using all relevant strategies. It tries to install the plugin, succeeds to install, but fails to load it still. Because it can't load openai and bootstrap plugin, it doesn't process any messages sent to it. However, it's able to find @elizaos/plugin-sql so I'm not sure what the difference is. **To Reproduce** On windows (powershell 7), create a new project and run 'elizaos dev' **Expected behavior** I expect it to load the plugins so that it can handle the messages send from the chat. **Screenshots** **Additional context** I'm on Windows Powershell 7. WSL is installed. I don't have this issue when I run it on my Ubuntu Linux VM. I cloned the eliza repo and ran 'bun install', 'bun run build' and 'bun start' and it's able to load everything on Windows Powershell 7. So it seems this is only failing when I try running the elizaos commands from a project, but not from the eliza repo itself.

topPRs.title: feat: add action chaining
topPRs.author: lalalune
topPRs.body:
This PR adds action chaining

Action state is stored on the State object which is passed down to actions

Action return values are stored in the action state for the run

"callback" is used to send a message to the user

Action state *should* be saved as a memory so the results of actions called are in the conversation stream of the recentMessagesProvider

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **New Features**
  * Introduced structured action results across all core and plugin actions, providing detailed success, failure, and error information for every action performed.
  * Added an action state provider to display and share action execution and planning status, including recent action results and execution history.
  * Enhanced recent messages to separately display action results and dialogue messages for improved clarity.

* **Improvements**
  * All action handlers now return detailed result objects instead of simple booleans or void, offering richer feedback and error reporting.
  * Enhanced error handling and reporting throughout actions, with consistent structured responses for all outcomes.
  * Improved test coverage to verify structured action results and enriched context passed to handlers.

* **Chores**
  * Updated dependencies and export statements for clarity and maintainability.

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

topPRs.title: fix: replace all window.confirm usages with useConfirmation across GUI
topPRs.author: tcm390
topPRs.body:
This PR systematically replaces all window.confirm usage across the Eliza codebase with the global useConfirmation hook, ensuring:

‚úÖ Consistent, theme-aware modal confirmations (light/dark mode support).
‚úÖ Accessible, non-blocking UI aligned with Eliza‚Äôs UX standards.
‚úÖ Centralized confirmation handling for better maintainability and testability.

üîÑ Refactored Areas:
System Logs Clear (handleClearLogs):

Replaced window.confirm with useConfirmation for clearing all logs.

AgentActionViewer (Delete Log Entry):

Replaced window.confirm with useConfirmation when deleting a single log entry.

MemoryEditOverlay (Delete Memory Confirmation):

Replaced window.confirm with useConfirmation before deleting a memory.

GroupPanel:

Replaced group deletion confirmation with useConfirmation.

Replaced ‚Äúremove all agents‚Äù confirmation with useConfirmation during updates.

topPRs.title: Merge develop into main

topPRs.body: This PR merges the latest changes from develop into main.

topPRs.title: fix: resolve SPA routing for globally installed CLI
topPRs.author: wtfsayo
topPRs.body:
## Summary
- Fixed SPA routing failures when refreshing non-home routes (e.g., `/chat/:agentId`, `/settings/`) for globally installed CLI
- Enhanced server path resolution to find client dist files in various installation scenarios

## Problem
When users install the elizaos CLI globally via `bun install -g @elizaos/cli` or npm, the server fails to find client dist files. This causes 404 errors when refreshing any route other than the home page, with error messages like:
```
[STATIC] Failed to serve index.html: Not Found
```

## Solution
Enhanced the server's path resolution logic to check multiple locations including:
- Bun's global installation path: `~/.bun/install/global/node_modules/@elizaos/cli/dist`
- npm's global installation path (via `npm root -g`)
- Common system-wide installation locations
- nvm-managed installations

## Changes
- Modified `packages/server/src/index.ts` to add comprehensive path resolution
- Added detailed logging to show all searched paths when client files aren't found
- Used the same resolved path for both static file serving and SPA fallback

## Testing
- Works correctly in monorepo development environment
- Resolves the issue for globally installed CLI packages
- Maintains backward compatibility with existing installations

Fixes the issue reported where SPA routing fails on refresh for non-home routes when CLI is installed from npm/bun.

topContributors.summary: wtfsayo: Merged 23 PRs in elizaos/eliza, including several merging develop to main, and made significant code changes across 252 files (+5623/-2967 lines) with a focus on bug fixes, and approved 1 review and commented on 2 PRs.

tcm390: Merged 6 PRs in elizaos/eliza, including a large refactoring to replace `window.confirm` usages (+801/-564 lines) and several bug fixes, with a total of +1507/-846 lines across 55 files. Also has 2 PRs open in elizaos/eliza.

ChristopherTrimboli: Merged 3 PRs in elizaos/eliza, including "fix: commit lerna changes" (elizaos/eliza#5463) and "fix: bump versions in lerna before build" (elizaos/eliza#5461, +18/-9 lines), and modified 21 files with +665/-293 lines, focusing on other and bugfix work. Also submitted 2 reviews, including 1 approval and 1 change request.
0xbbjoker: Merged elizaos/eliza#5475, fixing SPA routing fallback and a nested button hydration error (+41/-28 lines), and provided 3 approvals on other PRs. The work was focused on bug fixes.
lalalune: Merged a substantial feature addition, elizaos/eliza#5436 "feat: add action chaining" (+19421/-4014 lines), and modified 25 files with a focus on feature work.

SYMBaiEX: Merged elizaos/eliza#5437, fixing Windows plugin loading and dev command failures (+161/-151 lines), and made code changes across 28 files with a focus on bug fixes (57%) and feature work (29%). The work involved 14 commits.

yungalgo: Merged elizaos/eliza#5454, which updated the create command helper text and warning message (+84/-127 lines), and is working on elizaos/eliza#5456 to allow agent name argument passing in start and agent commands; also commented on 2 PRs.
bowtiedbluefin: Opened elizaos/eliza#5464, a feature update to plugin install logic, modifying 1 file with +17/-3 lines of code. bowtiedbluefin shows a pattern of consistent daily work.
borisudovicic: Opened two issues in elizaos/eliza, specifically #5452 regarding a v1 to v2 character migrator and #5438 to set up a rate-limited Eliza hosted LLM and embedding endpoint.
github-advanced-security: Activity included one review with comments. Sporadic activity was observed today.
linear: Created two issues in elizaos/eliza: #5432 regarding server start crashes and #5447 about update command behavior. Both issues were closed.
